component.name: ZetaOffice Calc
component.summary: Spreadsheet program of the ZetaOffice productivity suite

description.p: Calc is a powerful and extensible spreadsheet program, part of the ZetaOffice productivity suite. Newcomers find it intuitive and easy to learn. Professional data miners and number crunchers will appreciate the comprehensive range of advanced functions.
ZetaOffice supports opening and saving into a wide variety of formats, so you can easily share spreadsheets with users of other popular office suites without worrying about compatibility.
